meta.title: Agrofast - Agricultural Machinery Transport
meta.description: Fast and secure agricultural machinery transport

Index.title: Agricultural Transport
Index.subtitle: Agility in agricultural machinery transport
Index.descriptions: Revolutionizing the way you transport your agricultural machines
Index.start_download_here: Start downloading the Agrofast app here
Index.find_our_policies: Find our <policies>privacy policies</policies> and <terms>terms of use</terms> of the app by accessing these links.

About.paragraph_1: The app supports both drivers and machinery owners, with a proposal similar to Uber, but focused on transporting large machinery such as planters, harvesters, sprayers, and tractors.
About.paragraph_2: We guarantee safety and efficiency in every transport, with real-time monitoring and dedicated support to ensure your machines reach their destination without issues. Trust our experience and technology for your machinery transport needs.
About.paragraph_3: Find more information about the <policies>privacy policies</policies> and <terms>terms of use</terms> of the app by accessing these links.
